bibl.seg: Marcovich Miroslav, Sator Arepo = georgos Arpon (Knouphi), Arpos, Arpo(cra), Harpo(crates).

Arpo is a latinized form of a Kurzname of the extremely popular "god of good luck" Harpocrates. Our Zauberformel, apotropaic charm or phulakterion, would mean: "The sower Horus / Harpocrates checks toils and tortures" (e.g. Harpokrates ho speiron katechei ponous kai trochous).
